short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MGL Dryout Recalculation will trigger in every 10 mins of interval and predict the Dryout for the DBS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Run's in Incognito mode to Predict the upcoming CTV's to the DBS and calculate the E.T.A. DBS Dry-out calculation engine takes the Sales data and CTV's E.T.A to predict the Dry-out of all the active DBS.
